seoData.title: Veg Fried Rice
seoData.name: Veg Fried Rice
seoData.description: Aromatic and flavorful vegetable fried rice prepared with basmati rice, fresh mixed vegetables, and Indo-Chinese spices. A popular street food dish that's both filling and delicious, perfect for lunch or dinner.

seoData.title: Fried Momos (Crispy)
seoData.name: Fried Momos (Crispy)
seoData.description: Crispy and golden fried momos filled with fresh mixed vegetables. These deep-fried dumplings offer a delightful crunch with every bite while maintaining the traditional momo flavors. A popular variation loved by street food enthusiasts.

seoData.storageInstructions: Best consumed immediately while hot and crispy. Can be stored for few hours but may lose crispiness.
